patch.description: Updates the specified Comment using the validated input from CommentsRequest. The CommentsRequest parses posted_at into a date-time and enforces: content is required; posted_at is required and must be after or equal to the parent post's posted_at ($this->comment->post->posted_at); author_id is required and must exist in the users table.

parameters.description: ID of the Comment model to update (route model binding)
parameters.name: comment

posted_at.description: Timestamp when the comment was posted. Will be parsed server-side; must be after or equal to the parent post's posted_at.

302.description: Redirects to the admin comment edit page on success. The controller returns a RedirectResponse (HTTP 302) with a success flash message.

422.description: Validation failed. CommentsRequest requires 'content' (required), 'posted_at' (required, must be after_or_equal the parent post's posted_at), and 'author_id' (required, must exist in users table).

parameters.description: ID or route-model-binding key of the Post to remove the like from.
parameters.name: post

post.description: Validates and stores a new newsletter subscription. Requires an authenticated and email-verified user. Validation: 'email' is required, must be a valid email address and unique in the newsletter_subscriptions table. On success a NewsletterSubscription is created and the response is a redirect (302) with a success flash message (session key 'success'). On validation failure the response is a redirect (302) with validation errors stored in the session (session key 'errors').

email.description: Email address to subscribe to the newsletter
Email address to subscribe to the newsletter

302.description: Redirect response. On success redirects back with a session flash 'success' (e.g. 'Email added to the newsletter successfully'). On validation failure redirects back with validation errors in the session under the key 'errors'.
